instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> DISCHARGED ICON
threads.message: Hi, I have this board and when the battery is disconnected it works fine, when you connect the battery and try to turn it on you only get the "Discharged Battery" icon on screen. It doesn´t boot or do anything further... I am thinking SMC problem there?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> DISCHARGED ICON
threads.message: That happens with battery without charger?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> DISCHARGED ICON
threads.message: On battery it doesn´t turn on.... if I disconnect the battery it boots and works fine. If its on and I connect the battery It instantly turns off...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> DISCHARGED ICON
threads.message:
Post exact <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> voltage on charger only.
Chec if <TRANSISTOR>Q7155</TRANSISTOR> is not shorted D-S.
